title: New: Fickle Friends – P L A Y
body:
Photo: Carly-Ann Morris

Brighton is a hot-spot for emerging new music right now, and ’80’s new wave pop’ outfit **Fickle Friends** are leading the way.

Having clocked up an impressive 350k Soundcloud plays of their debut track _[S W I M](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/25784-new-fickle-friends-swim/)_, they’ve followed it up with the equally bold _P L A Y_. Perhaps less straight up ‘pop’, and leaning towards mid-00’s pop-punk in parts, and just as suited for the festival circuit. Check out _P L A Y_ below.
